overview: The film is set in the Tunkinskaya Valley. Successful businessman Vyacheslav returns to his small homeland, to take his mother with him. That she lived with him in the city. The mother's reluctance to move, everyday problems force Vyacheslav to stay longer. With each new day, he sees and personally faces the problems of rural life. Will he be able to unwind the tangle of unsolved problems or will he leave everything as it is? You will see in our film.
title: Bulag 2. Towards a New Life
